taxon_identification.taxon_hierarchy: family rosaceae;tribe rubeae;genus rubus;subgenus eubatus;section hispidi;species kalamazoensis;

treatment.description: Resembling no. 60, but with stronger prickles; leaves thin, dull green, with 3 (sometimes 5) blunt glabrous sharply serrate leaflets; canes without glands; pedicels glandless or nearly so, bearing numerous spicules.
